title: On Socrates' Wisdom
preview: A chreia exploring Socrates' famous statement about knowing nothing.

title: Against Betrayal of Public Trust
preview: commonplace speech denouncing the violation of public trust by those in positions of authority.

title: Solitude and Community
preview: A comparative analysis of the values and limitations of solitude and community in human flourishing.

title: In Defense of Liberal Arts Education
preview: A confirmation of the enduring value of liberal arts education in the age of ai

title: The Ancient Olive Grove at Dawn
preview: A vivid description of an ancient Mediterranean olive grove as the sun rises.

title: In Praise of Public Libraries
preview: An encomium celebrating the vital role of public libraries in democratic societies.

title: The Ant and the Grasshopper
preview: A retelling of Aesop's classic fable about preparation and foresight.

title: Galileo Addresses the Inquisition
preview: An impersonation of Galileo Galilei defending his scientific work before the Roman Inquisition.

title: Proposal for a Universal Basic Income
preview: An introduction of a law establishing a universal basic income to address economic inequality and technological displacement.

title: On the Value of Patience
preview: An elaboration on the maxim 'Patience is a virtue' and its applications in life.

title: The Journey to Mount Olympus
preview: A narrative exercise describing a mythical journey to the home of the gods.

title: Against the Claim That Wealth Brings Happiness
preview: A refutation of the common belief that accumulating wealth leads to greater happiness.

title: On Whether One Should Marry
preview: A thesis examining the question of whether marriage is beneficial for human flourishing.

title: Against Willful Ignorance
preview: A vituperation condemning the deliberate rejection of knowledge and evidence.
